insert into integral_account_detail (user_id, integral_account_id, opration_score, available_score, opration_type, score_type, score_status, score_source, is_deleted, gmt_create, gmt_modify) values (#{userId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{integralAccountId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{oprationScore,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{availableScore,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{oprationType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{scoreType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{scoreStatus,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{scoreSource,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{isDeleted,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{gmtCreate,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{gmtModify,jdbcType=VARCHAR})
mapper.update: update integral_account_detail set user_id = #{userId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, integral_account_id = #{integralAccountId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, opration_score = #{oprationScore,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, available_score = #{availableScore,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, opration_type = #{oprationType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, score_type = #{scoreType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, score_status = #{scoreStatus,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, score_source = #{scoreSource,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, is_deleted = #{isDeleted,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, gmt_create = #{gmtCreate,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, gmt_modify = #{gmtModify,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where id = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.select: select id, user_id, integral_account_id, opration_score, available_score, opration_type, score_type, score_status, score_source, is_deleted, gmt_create, gmt_modify from integral_account_detail where id = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

select id, user_id, integral_account_id, opration_score, available_score, opration_type, score_type, score_status, score_source, is_deleted, gmt_create, gmt_modify from integral_account_detail where opration_type = #{outerBusinessCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
